data.title: Andrijana Sofranić Šućur
data.text:
About

Andrijana is a Serbian producer working across documentary, fiction and animation, with a focus on author-driven cinema. She has a degree in Classical Studies from the Faculty of Philosophy, University of Belgrade. Two films she produced, Mamonga (2019) and Roots (2021), premiered at Karlovy Vary IFF. In 2019, she co-founded the production company Set Sail Films in Belgrade. She is an alumna of EAVE Marketing Workshop, Rotterdam Lab, IDFAcademy, MIDPOINT Feature Launch and CEE Animation Workshop.
